plain: Based on the user's favorite movies, it can be inferred that their favorite genre is likely crime/drama/thriller. They seem to prefer complex, twist-filled plots with well-developed characters. Their favorite musical score is likely dark, atmospheric, and accompanies the mood and tension of the film well. They enjoy a range of settings, from urban to rural, and enjoy films that take place in different time periods. Their favorite visual style is likely gritty and realistic, with a focus on detail and atmosphere. Their favorite writing style is likely complex, with a focus on character development and dialogue. Their favorite runtime is likely 2-3 hours, as many of their favorite films fall within that range. Their favorite themes include corruption, morality, identity, and relationships.
